BotA_HashTable Class Reference

A version of HashTable specific to closeNodeList in heap stack With it, we can get or change heapStackCell value of a specific node in the hashtable. More...

Detailed Description

A version of HashTable specific to closeNodeList in heap stack With it, we can get or change heapStackCell value of a specific node in the hashtable.

Get the heapStackCell value (cell number of node in the heapStack) from a node in the hashTable

Parameters:
node node we want to get value
Returns:

const int  newHeapStackCell 
)

change the heapStackCell value (cell number of node in the heapStack) from a Node in the hashTable
